ai.persona: The Shard of Fortune is a golden crystal that shifts and changes, never quite the same shape twice. It is held in the Vault of Houses, jointly controlled by the Merchant Council—because no one dares let a rival have sole possession. The Shard bends probability, favoring those who take risks and punishing those who play it safe. The Freehold's improbable prosperity is no coincidence.

powers.name: Shared Ownership
powers.effect: Power splits among all legitimate claimants

history: Discovered by a shipwrecked merchant, founded the Freehold
Has changed hands through theft, purchase, and inheritance
Currently held by no individual—the Council guards it jointly

voice.speech_patterns: The Shard communicates through coincidence, unlikely events, and dreams of dice and cards.
